title: HTML Comment Tag
text: You can add comments to your HTML source by using the following syntax:

Notice that there is an exclamation point (!) in the start tag, but not in the 
end tag.
Note: Comments are not displayed by the browser, but they can help document your HTML source code.

title: Add Comments
text: With comments you can place notifications and reminders in your HTML code:

title: Hide Content
text: Comments can be used to hide content.
This can be helpful if you hide content temporarily:

Example

This is a paragraph.

This is a paragraph too.

Try it Yourself »

You can also hide more than one line. Everything between the <!-- and the -->
will be hidden from the display.
